ad_text: Mission Petroleum Carriers, Inc. Careers Sponsored Your values are our values; safety, family, company culture, job security, pay and benefits and pride in our work. Our home terminal in Three Rivers, TX is looking for safe, family and team oriented professional drivers to haul crude oil. Gross up to $1,500 to $1,800 per week. Home Daily working with a Family owned and operated team for over 60 years. Safely and accurately measure, gather, and transport crude oil from lease sites to the unloading facility. On the job training in measuring and loading crude oil. New Peterbilt tractors throughout the fleet. Positions available in and near Cotulla/Crystal City, Falfurrias/Kingsville, Karnes City, Luling, and Three Rivers. FULL-TIME · THREE RIVERS, TEXAS Class A CDL Truck Driver Apply now
